The rest of the articles are in the blog archives, you can also subscribe for email updates. We send very infrequent updates. We have a very simple privacy policy "we won't share your personal data with anyone else, and we won't use it for anything other that its intended purpose, which is to send you only awesome goodness"; for the serious types, you can read the privacy policy.

Efficient Android App Development

  • Use Android Studio 3 to quickly and confidently build your first Android apps
  • Build an Android user interface using activities and layouts, event handling, images, menus and the action bar
  • Learn how to run codes in the background thread
